messages.subject: late war fittings 1944? style
messages.msgSnippet: I just picked up a sword in fair shape dated showa 20 February in 1944 army mounts with 2 hole tang.   It is missing the saya upper fitting and the tsuka
messages.messageBody:
I just picked up a sword in fair shape dated showa 20 February in 1944 army mounts with 2 hole tang.   It is missing the saya upper fitting and the tsuka lower fitting - the ones that have the clasp that holds the sword in the saya.   These would have been black color.   Anyone know where I can get these?   I am on vacation in Montana and away from all my references.   I will NOT put repro fittings on an original even though it is a seki stamped gunto.   This one appears to have a gifu chimata stamp as well.   Please reply to my off list address as I am on the road with little bandwidth to keep checking the list.

Dennis
